evalMessage:
Student evaluations of courses and faculty are a vital part of our efforts to ensure quality programs. Your thoughtful ranking and comments are valued and appreciated. Evaluations are 100% anonymous. Thank you for taking the time to give us your input.

Note: You may SAVE your evaluation to complete it later, but you must eventually SUBMIT your evaluation for it to count.
mainMessage:
Welcome to the online course evaluation system! We appreciate your feedback.

Note: You may only submit each evaluation once.
